title: SD MIST WAN - Bundling of all leftover topics 2024
description:
Description
This PE serves to bracket all MIST SD WAN leftover activities on Secure Networking Platform (SNP) for 2024, to support the product-life-cycle for below products. Topics are worked upon according to agreed prioritization!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. MIST SD WAN SRX
Dt.: Telekom SD-WAN auf Basis Juniper (MIST)
Engl.: Telekom SD-WAN based on Juniper (MIST)
VPO-Nr: 460405 (same as for SRX)
Offer Module ID:  60000029
2 MIST SD WAN SSR 
Dt.: Telekom SD-WAN auf Basis Juniper (SSR)
Engl.: Telekom SD-WAN based on Juniper (SSR)
VPO-Nr: 460405 (same as for SRX)
Offer Module ID:  60000035

Business Scope:
This PE serves to bracket all MIST SD WAN leftover activities on Secure Networking Platform (SNP) for 2024.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Topics are worked upon according to agreed prioritization

components.title: SDN Wenn SDX betroffen ist muss die Components SDN gesetzt werden
